author: Jordan Dixon-Hamilton
title: Exclusive  Jim Bognet: China Is Our Number One Strategic Enemy for the 21st Century

sentence: In Pennsylvania, Republican House contender Jim Bognet ran an ad saying, "Well make China pay for the lies they told, the jobs they stole and the lives weve lost."
title: Tim Ryan's not a Sinophobe, but he needs to find another scapegoat

sentence: The road for Republicans to take back the House starts in President Bidens hometown district, Trump-endorsed Pennsylvania congressional hopeful Jim Bognet told Breitbart News Saturday, noting that the shellacking? will send a shockwave through the country and show Americans that the America First agenda is alive and well.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: Exclusive  PA Congressional Candidate Jim Bognet: Were Taking Back Joe Bidens Hometown District
